testcase.classname: Create new account - Send Activation Code
testcase.name: Enter details and get activation code
testcase.system-out: Given User open desired browser.............................................passed And User open WOW home page "http://localhost/wow/index.php"................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Welcome"...............passed And User click on Create an Account button..................................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Registration Form".....passed And User type user name "Bon"...............................................passed And User type email "Bon@test.com.au".......................................passed And User click on accept terms and condtion checkbox........................passed And User press Send Activation Code button..................................passed Then User presented with a response "Great. Just one more step to go".......passed

testcase.classname: Login with valid credentials and go to lessons area for members
testcase.name: Login with valid user name and password
testcase.system-out: Given User open desired browser.............................................passed And User open WOW home page "http://localhost/wow/index.php"................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Welcome"...............passed And User click on Proceed To Lessons button.................................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Login".................passed And User Enter email "john@test.com.au".....................................passed And User Enter password "goodday"...........................................passed And User press login button.................................................passed Then User presented with WOW home page having title "Login Success".........passed
